text:
Question 146) The taxpayer who sells more than R $ 20,000 of stock stock shares in one month must pay income tax. Payment for the IRS will consist of 15% of the profit from the sale of shares.
A taxpayer who sells for R $ 34 thousand a lot of shares that cost R $ 26 thousand will have to pay income tax to the IRS the amount of
A) R $ 900.00.
B) R $ 1 200.00.
C) R $ 2 100.00.
D) R $ 3 900.00.
E) R $ 5 100.00.
